page.title: 10Leisure time,Bradford
page.content: We found out how{leisure}time is spent after school and at weekends.Most girls go to Brownies and most boys go to Cubs.These clubs are run on similar lines,games are played and badges are} earned. { Cubs}play{games}like poison and traffic lights but also they work to earn{badges.}Everyone tries to earn their arrow badges because they are the highest ones.For each arrow you do 12 tests,3 tests of 4 different things. { Brownies}play games like rabbit hutches and ladders.They fill in their Brownie books by answering questions.The best badge is the Highway badge.Then when you are old enough you can join the Guides.Children enjoy being part of a club because it is good fun and it stops them from being bored.
